#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#define DIV 1000000

using namespace std;

typedef unsigned long long int Lint;

Lint raise( Lint a, Lint b ) {
	
	Lint d;

	if( b == 0 )
		return 1;
	else {
		
		if( b & 0x1 ) {

			d = raise( a, ( b - 1 ) / 2 ) % DIV;
			return ( ( a % DIV ) * ( (d * d ) % DIV ) ) % DIV;
		}
		else {

			d = raise( a,  b / 2 ) % DIV;
			return ( d * d ) % DIV;
		}
	}
}

int main() {
	
	Lint t, a, b;

	while( 1 ) {
		
		scanf("%llu %llu", &a, &b );

		if( ( a == 0 ) && ( b == 0 ) )
			break;
		printf("%llu\n", raise( a, b ) );		
	}

	return 0;
}
